comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0a1)
Gecko/20110420 Firefox/6.0a1


New Mac Wireless keyboard dont have "Home", "End", "Page up", "Page Down", "Insert", "Delete" keys.
http://www.apple.com/keyboard/

And "Back Space" key is renamed as "Delete" with behavior as BackSpace
To get "Delete" key functionality user now can do "fn" key + "Delete" key 
And it works on TEXTAREA and Design Mode.

But to delete Form Field History item, "fn" + "Delete" wont work.
comments.author: BijuMailList@GMail.Com
